author: clement
msg: Minor fixes in the bad lifecycle controller handler tests to reflect recent changes (factory attribute is now deprecated)

author: clement
msg: Several improvements in the event admin handler:
- add checking when the factory is initializing instead of during the instance creation
- subscribers are no more ignored when an error occurs
- fix a mistake (eventadmins instead of eventadmin) in the artifactid
- the handler now requires the event admin as an iPOJO dependency, this avoids tracking the service

author: markt
msg: No roles (deny all) trumps no auth-constraint (allow all)

author: bentmann
msg: [MPLUGIN-129] Avoid generation of emtpy plugin report for POM projects
